title: When you downvote your own thread

replies.body: When people upvote the comments and not the thread xD

When people say they agree with the thread but don't upvote

https://media.giphy.com/media/IwmztXQO7BUzu/giphy.gif
When someone says "poor man" to a hobo but gives no money.

> [{quoted}](name=Astrophel,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=wTXbv4E3,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-11T21:48:27.436+0000)
>
> When someone says "poor man" to a hobo but gives no money.

When someone wishes they could afford to help others,
When people upvote, but don't respond, so the thread dies anyway.
Why're all the cool ones on OCE ;( I wanna play with the King of the pirates too </3
